DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy safety dronabinol MDI acute treatment moderate severe migraine headache .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Dronabinol Metered Dose Inhaler ( MDI ) Acute Treatment Migraine Headache
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 65 year , inclusive , clinically diagnose migraine without aura base International Headache Society criterion Subjects experience migraine prolong aura ; familiar hemiplegic migraine ; migrainous infarction basilar migraine ; great eight migraine attack per month and/or great 14 migraine day per month .
